text: Ted Cruz: Democratic Party's base is 'bat-crap crazy' Please enable flash to watch this video. Sorry, this video is not available. Your browser does not currently support live streaming video. Play Video Live Video - At the 2017 Conservative Political Action Conference, Sen. Ted Cruz (R-Tex.) spoke about Democratic lawmakers saying, they are "living in an alternate universe" and concerned about a base that he described as "bat-crap crazy."
